title: 編集: 注目のSCP
content:
[[module ListPages category="attention-jp" limit="1" order="name desc"]]
[[div class="numparent"]]
= [[a href="*/attention-jp:[[#ifexpr (%%name%%+1) < 10 | 0 ]][[#ifexpr (%%name%%+1) < 100 | 0 ]][[#ifexpr (%%name%%+1) < 1000 | 0 ]][[#expr %%name%%+1]]/edit/true/parentPage/_attention-jp-scp" class="button num"]]番目の注目のSCPを追加する。[[/a]][[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[module listpages  category="attention-jp" limit="1" order="name desc" _category="1" _original="1"]]
[[%%content{0}%%module css]]
.numparent {
  counter-reset: num %%total%%;
}
.numparent a.button.num:before {
  counter-increment: num;
  content: '"'counter(num)'"';
}
[[%%content{0}%%/module]]
[[/module]]
----
* [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/_attention-jp-scp 編集: 注目のSCP]
* [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/_attention-jp-tale 編集: 注目のTale]
* [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/_attention-jp-goif 編集: 注目のGoIF]
* [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/_attention-translation-scp 編集: 注目の翻訳SCP]
* [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/_attention-translation-tale 編集: 注目の翻訳Tale]
* [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/_attention-translation-goif 編集: 注目の翻訳GoIF]
* [http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/_attention-news 編集: ニュース]
----
[[module ListPages category="attention-jp" order="_date desc"  _category="1" _original="1" perPage="250"]]
[[div style="[[#if %%form_raw{deleted}%% | display:none; | ]]"]]
[[#expr %%total%% - %%index%% +1 ]]. [[[%%form_raw{url}%%|]]]: %%form_raw{meta}%% by [[*user %%form_raw{author}%%]]\
[[ul]][[li]]\
%%form_raw{desc}%%\
 ([[[*/%%fullname%% |移動]]]) ([[[*/%%fullname%%#_editpage |編集]]]) _
[[size 75%]](**登録日:** [[date %%form_data{date}%% format="%Y/%m/%d"]])[[/size]]
[[/li]][[/ul]]\
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-jp:component:coltop show=+ 過去注目記事タグ一覧|hide=- 閉じる]]
[[module ListPages category="attention-jp" order="_date desc" _category="1" _original="1" perPage="250"]]
[[#expr %%total%% - %%index%% +1 ]]. **[[[%%form_raw{url}%%|]]]**: %%form_raw{meta}%% by [[*user %%form_raw{author}%%]]
[[iframe http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/fragment:attention-page-tag-monitoring/limit/1/fullname/%%form_data{url}%%?theme_url=http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--code/fragment%3Aattention-page-tag-monitoring/1 style="width: 100%;height: 80px;"]]
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-jp:component:colend nohide=true]]

[[iftags]]
[[include :scp-jp:fragment:attention-page-tag-monitoring]]
[[/iftags]]
author: 7happy7
